Title: PDN C++ AMP Effects
Description: Paint.NET Gaussian blur effect written in C++ AMP
HomeWiki:
Paint.NET Gaussian blur written in C++ AMP


Extract zip file into the Paint.NET effects folder. Typically c:\Program Files\Paint.NET\Effects

Run the effect from the Effects > Blurs > (AMP) Gaussian Blur menu.

Requires Microsoft Visual Studio 2012 RC to be installed to run.
